alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 20 at 2:37PM AKST until November 21 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...East winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Denali Borough, Southern Denali Borough, Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp and Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Rapid reductions in visibility from blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Recent snowfall will cause blowing and drifting snow with reduced visibility. Travel may be particularly difficult over summits.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range North of Trims Camp; Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Northern Denali Borough; Southern Denali Borough
